items.title: Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” Collection Available!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
July 8, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that the Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” product collection is available for purchase.

The Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection is the first product collaboration project between HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- and artist-driven merchandise brand Doki Dreamers. The product collection features a lineup of baking-themed accessories, including a cookie-style button, a chocolate-style keychain, an enamel pin, a collection of “cheki”-style photo cards, and a beautiful poster featuring each of the HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- talents. The Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection merchandise is available on the Doki Dreamers online shop from June 20, 2025 from 10:00 AM (PDT), and will be available at ANIME Impulse Orange County in Anaheim, CA on August 30th and 31st, 2025.

For more information, please visit the official Doki Dreamers social media accounts and official website.

Doki Dreamers × HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- “Sweet Love” collection

・ Cookie button pins ・ Photo cards ・ Key Visual poster

Online Shipping Shipping from: Washington State, USA

Shipping is subject to availability. Orders containing backlogged products may be delayed. Orders may be cancelled any time prior to shipping.

Doki Dreamers strives to connect the dreams of creators with the hearts of fans, celebrating their communities and making memories together. Their shop specializes in creating high quality products for VTubers and their communities. Each product is made with the belief that merchandise should be as colorful and unique as the talents themselves, and be a fun way to celebrate and share love for a community.

items.title: GHOST X GHOST Teams Up with Mori Calliope Again for a PORTRAIT OF DEATH drop!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
July 3, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced another collaboration between GHOST X GHOST and Mori Calliope of hololive English of hololive production. Following the success of the previous Metalcropolis collaboration, they will launch a new limited-edition series titled .

Taking some inspiration from Alphonse Mucha and the desire to showcase talents in a new way the GHOST X GHOST team have created an unexpected and unique design in the PORTRAIT series. Illustrator Florian Bertmer brings Mori Calliope to life in a design that fuses elegance with ominous grace befit for the reaper’s apprentice.

“We’re stoked to work with Calli again, and we hope you’re ready to face her PORTRAIT OF DEATH.” the GHOST X GHOST team shared.

The Mori Calliope – Portrait of Death series includes

Long-Sleeve T-Shirt – $45 Printed on Comfort Colors “pepper” long-sleeved t-shirt and features printed sleeves.

White Variant T-Shirt – $30 Available for PREORDER for 24-hours only! Features metallic silver ink.

Standard & Long-Sleeve T-Shirts: Pre-orders open Tuesday, July 2nd at 5 PM PDT and close Friday, July 25th at 12 PM PDT.

Extremely limited—preorders are available only for 24 hours! From July 2nd at 5 PM PDT to July 3rd at 5 PM PDT.

Whether you’re a fan of Mori Calliope or love art and fashion, don’t miss the series—check it out now!

items.title: HOLOSTARS English to Host a Welcome Giveaway Campaign in Celebration of New Social Media Accounts!
items.author: narita
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a HOLOSTARS English Welcome Giveaway campaign in celebration of two new official social media accounts.

The followers’ welcoming giveaway, taking place on X, Instagram, and TikTok, will last from July 1st until July 23rd JST, with a total of 30 winners across the three campaigns.

Nine of these lucky winners will be eligible to receive three 3D Acrylic Stands of their choice from HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- or HOLOSTARS English -ARMIS-, while 21 winners will be eligible to receive one holoEmblem Pin Badge of their choice, also from HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- or HOLOSTARS English -ARMIS-.

HOLOSTARS English Welcome Giveaway

July 1st 10:00AM – July 23rd at 1:00PM JST

30 winners across 3 social media platforms will be contacted on July 25th at 12:00PM JST.

*Followers must participate with a public account that can accept private messages for a chance to win.

– The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English X account.

– The user must give the giveaway post a Like.

– The user must give the giveaway post a Repost.

3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners

holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners

– The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English Instagram account.

– The user must give the giveaway post a Like.

– The user must comment on the giveaway post with three oshimarks of their favorite talents.

3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners

holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners

– The user must be following the official HOLOSTARS English X account.

– The user must give the giveaway post a Like.

– The user must comment on the giveaway post with three oshimarks of their favorite talents.

3D Acrylic Stands of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:3) : 3 winners

holoEmblem Pin Badge of the Winner’s Choice (Qty:1) : 7 winners

items.title: hololive English Teams Up with Kura Sushi USA for an Exclusive Summer Collaboration!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
July 2, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English of hololive production is collaborating with Kura Sushi USA. The exclusive campaign is running from July 1st until July 31st, 2025.

hololive English × Kura Sushi: Exclusive Collab Experience Across the U.S.!

A limited-time campaign is rolling out at Kura Sushi locations across the U.S. from July 1st to 31st, featuring three hololive English talents — , , and ! Don’t miss out on this exciting experience, with specially crafted menu items and immersive in-store elements designed for fans and food enthusiasts alike.

Kura Sushi USA x hololive English Exclusive Sushi Dishes

Enjoy three original dishes inspired by Ninomae Ina’nis, Ouro Kronii, and Gigi Murin!

is honored with the Spicy Crunchy Squid, featuring squid tempura topped with spicy mayo, eel sauce, and bonito flakes over Kura’s specialty sushi rice.

influence comes to life in the Tuna with Avocado Cream Cheese, which pairs soy-marinated tuna with avocado and cream cheese over Kura’s specialty sushi rice.

is represented by the vibrant Salmon & Tamago Spicy Roll, made with spicy salmon and tamago atop a shrimp mayo roll finished with panko crunchy flakes.

Exclusive hololive English × Kura Sushi USA Goods to Complement the Culinary Experience!

Kura Sushi USA x hololive English bottle set Available starting July 1st, 2025 for , while supplies last.*1 design in total; limited to three per party. Available for purchase in-restaurant only.

Kura Sushi USA x hololive English cooling towel and carrying case set Available from July 21st with a minimum spend of in-store at participating locations, while supplies last.*1 design in total; limited to three per party.

Get Immersed in the Summer Festivities at hololive English Themed Stores!

Participating Kura Sushi USA locations will feature hololive English themed in-store decorations throughout the duration of the promotion, transforming the dining experience into a fully immersive, fan-centric celebration.

“We’re incredibly excited to partner with hololive English for our first U.S.-based VTuber collaboration,” said , President and CEO of Kura Sushi USA, Inc. “This campaign offers a one-of-a-kind experience that blends fan culture with Kura’s passion for innovation and fun.”

About Kura Sushi USA, Inc.

Kura Sushi USA, Inc. is a technology-enabled Japanese restaurant concept with over 76 locations across the United States. Known for its revolving sushi bar experience and commitment to quality ingredients, Kura Sushi USA is a subsidiary of Kura Sushi, Inc., which has operated in Japan for over 45 years since 1977.

items.title: hololive Gen 0 Octopus Card Pre-Sale!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
COVER Corporation has officially announced an extended collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, unveiling a series of exclusive physical Octopus card-sets featuring the beloved talents of hololive Gen 0. Pre-orders for this special edition are now available at: https://pump-water.com/product-category/hololive

The hololive Gen 0 Octopus Card set is available in two editions: a and a , perfect for both practical users and passionate collectors. Showcasing Gen 0 members in classic Hong Kong-style outfits, take them along as you wander the streets, savour local delicacies, and make them part of your everyday life!

Special Edition Octopus Single Card Set

Set Includes: ・ hololive Gen 0 Special Edition Octopus Card

・ Octopus Card Holder with Lanyard

*Designs under supervision

Special Edition Octopus Collector Set

Set Includes: ・ hololive Gen 0 Special Edition Octopus Card

・ Magnetic Octopus Card Holder

・ Card Display Stand

・ Acrylic Shikishi Artboard

・ Gift Box Packaging

Pre-order your exclusive Octopus Card to take Gen 0 talents with you wherever you go! The products will be available for purchase on Pump-Water.com, the platform dedicated to licensed anime merchandise. *Designs under supervision

Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

items.title: Brace Yourself Games x hololive Collaboration: hololive DLC Pack Comes to Rift of the NecroDancer!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
June 25, 2025 – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a collaboration between Brace Yourself Games and hololive production. An all-new downloadable content (DLC) pack featuring hololive talents will be added to Rift of the NecroDancer, the game. The collaboration will launch simultaneously on Steam and Nintendo Switch on June 25th.

Players will be able to sync the beat to five brand-new tracks featuring from hololive talents – including the graduated Gawr Gura. As a special promotion for this exciting crossover, the track “REFLECT” by Gawr Gura will be available to all Rift of the NecroDancer players to download for free.

The full lineup of songs in the hololive Music Pack includes: ・ “REFLECT” by Gawr Gura (Free to download!)

・ “BIBBIDIBA” by Hoshimachi Suisei

・ “Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆” by Houshou Marine

・ “Play Dice!” by Hakos Baelz

・ “Carbonated Love” by IRyS

Each song will be available for individual purchase at $1.99 USD, or fans can grab the entire collection as a bundle for a 25% discount. We hope you enjoy it! The hololive DLC drops on Steam and Nintendo Switch on June 25th.

items.title: hololive English -Justice- Announces 3D Showcase Schedule!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
June 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) today announced the hololive English -Justice-’s 3D Showcase Schedule, kicking off with Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame on August 1st, Gigi Murin on August 2nd, Cecilia Immergreen on August 8th, Raora Panthera on August 9th, and a 3D Collaboration on August 16th. (PDT)

hololive English -Justice- talents Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame, Gigi Murin, Cecilia Immergreen, and Raora Panthera will star in their individual 3D Showcases, followed by a 3D Collaboration livestream together.

The 3D showcases for hololive English -Justice- members and their collaboration stream will feature various contents and performances from each of the talents. The four talents will also be joining their fellow hololive English members in the upcoming hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One- event, announced to be happening later in August.

hololive English -Justice- 3D Showcase

items.title: COVER Corporation Announces hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
June 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English will be holding their third concert event, hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-, on August 23rd and 24th at the Radio City Music Hall in New York, NY, over the span of two days.

The concert will feature the members of hololive English, including members of hololive English -Justice-, who will be debuting in 3D before the performance during the month of August 2025. More details regarding their upcoming 3D debuts can be found here.

“Our staff have been working hard to make this concert even more enjoyable than previous ones, so please look forward to it! If you can’t make it there, we hope you will tune in via livestreaming,” commented Motoaki Tanigo, CEO, COVER Corporation.

Additional updates will be shared through hololive English’s official social media channels, so be sure to follow them!

items.title: hololive English -Advent- are teaming up with SUSHIRO TAIWAN Starting June 16!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
June 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English -Advent- of hololive production, will be collaborating with SUSHIRO TAIWAN. Merchandise and theme store activities will start on June 16th and end on August 10th.

hololive English -Advent- are coming to Ximending! On Friday, June 13th at 8:00 PM Local Time, hololive English -Advent- will appear on the big screen of the Watsons Wuchang store in Ximending, Taipei. Join us for this special event and be part of the excitement!

SUSHIRO TAIWAN x hololive English -Advent- stores will launch on Monday, June 16th. Exclusive merchandise, themed menu items, and specially decorated stores. Don’t miss out on this exciting opportunity to enjoy delicious sushi while collecting must-have collaboration goods!

The event includes exclusive gift-with-purchases, add-on purchase promotions, as well as four limited-time collaborative sushi dishes. Every order comes with a special insert card and a surprise badge from a blind bag!

SUSHIRO TAIWAN x hololive English -Advent- Collaboration Gift

Collect Insert Cards and Badges with Every Order!

From June 16th, order any of the following collaboration dishes in-store at SUSHIRO TAIWAN and receive both a hololive English -Advent- insert card and a mystery badge:

Salmon Tamago Roll – Shiori Novella Insert Card Meat & Egg Inari Sushi – Nerissa Ravencroft Insert Card

・ SUSHIRO TAIWAN x hololive English -Advent- 12 Mystery Badge Bonus

items.title: hololive night Collaboration Event Returns to Dodger Stadium on July 5th, 2025!
items.author: Horii
items.content:
June 9, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN — COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) announced the second collaboration between the Los Angeles Dodgers and hololive production, taking place on Saturday, July 5th, 2025, at 4:15 PM (PDT).

After a successful first collaboration with the Los Angeles Dodgers last year, “hololive night” will return to Dodgers Stadium again a second time. This year’s collaboration will feature the first-ever VTuber livestream both to and from Dodger Stadium. To furthermore commemorate this unique evening, co-branded Dodgers x hololive production merchandise will be available to purchase in the gift shops across the stadium.

Fans can expect exclusive in-stadium appearances from three hololive English talents, Ninomae Ina’nis, IRyS and Koseki Bijou in real time. The hololive talents will not only cheer for the Dodgers, but also provide their sing-along version of “Take Me Out to the Ball Game” during the seventh-inning stretch of the baseball game. At the end of the game, fans will be invited to join the talents on the field, where they will host special programming such as interactive activities, and a new “WHO’S got the MOVES?!?!” segment where fans can dance and jam together to popular hololive tunes.

In addition, this special event will be broadcast live to hololive English’s official YouTube channel, marking the first time ever in history for a VTuber company to stream both to and from Dodger Stadium. Fans can also enjoy a vast series of onsite hololive-themed activities, such as taking pictures with the featured talent’s cutouts, helping themselves to delicious stadium food and drinks with event-only hololive themed packaging, and more to be announced via hololive English’s official social media channels later.

The hololive night ticket package includes a ticket to baseball game as well as event-exclusive Dodger x hololive production trading cards (pack of three) that feature the three main cast of this year’s event in Dodgers uniforms. Lucky fans may even draw a special version of the cards that include the talent’s printed autograph!

Get hyped with us for this exciting collaboration between the Los Angeles Dodgers and hololive production! We hope to see you at the game.

Official Hashtag: #hololiveDodgers

・ “Play Ball!” Announcement ・ “Take Me Out to The Ball Game” Sing-a-long ・ Photo Spot with Life-size Cutouts

・ Event-Only Food & Beverage Packaging

・ holodance Crowd Dance Project

・ First-ever VTuber Livestream from the Stadium … and MORE!

Collaboration Merchandise

(*Products under development)

Available from July 5th, 2025 in all shops inside Dodger Stadium. *While supplies last!

On July 5th at Dodger Stadium, special beer, soda, and popcorn cups will be offered in hololive collaboration packaging. Please enjoy these special collaboration designs, which can only be enjoyed during hololive night.

hololive night Ticket Information

hololive night Ticket Purchase Bonus: Special Trading Cards (pack of three)

For the first time in history, a VTuber livestream will be held at and from Dodger Stadium. The livestream will be available on YouTube, allowing people from all over the world to experience the thrill of the event in real time.

・ Dance Project “WHO’S got the MOVES?!?!” The livestream will feature a dance project segment taking place at Dodger Stadium. Songs by hololive production talents will be played at the stadium, and those who want to try their hand at the choreography will dance together! The song selection will be announced later on hololive production’s official social media.

The stream will also feature other surprises from hololive production, including past videos, so be sure to tune in!

Despite her looks, Ina’nis is actually a priestess of the Ancient Ones. One day, she picked up a strange book and then started to gain the power of controlling tentacles. To her, tentacles are just a part in her ordinary life; it has never been a big deal for her. However, her girly mind does want to get them dressed up and stay pretty.

After gaining power, she started hearing Ancient Whispers and Revelations. Hence, she began her VTuber activities to deliver random sanity checks on humanity, as an ordinary girl.

A Nephilim who was once the embodiment of hope back in “The Paradise”.

While she has left to set off on an adventure, she continues to deliver hope through her lyrics and songs, with determination in her voice.

She also bears the precarious and unstable dual nature of a half-demon and half-angel; this phenomenon can be observed on rare occasions, in the form of the most unpredictably

yaba—*ahem*, “surprising”, comments from IRyS herself. Bewildering those around her is but another unexpected charm of her duality.

Formed from the crystallization of all forms of human emotion, Koseki Bijou is “The Jewel of Emotions.”

Over years and years, emotions of beauty and filth alike have woven into her under immense pressure, resulting in an unmatched brilliance.

Her ancient, mystic brilliance caused strife between the masses of the greedy, who fought over ownership of her. This led to her being imprisoned in secrecy, far from the reach of humans.

It seems as though when she encounters people, and particularly their good emotions, her radiance shines even brighter.

items.title: COVER Corporation Collaborates with We’s Star Ltd. for Mori Calliope themed New Liqueur “MoriZakura もり桜・花鳥風月”
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced an upcoming collaboration between VTuber agency hololive production and We’s Star Ltd. (Taichung City, Taiwan) for the new Mori Calliope themed liqueur “MoriZakura もり桜・花鳥風月”. Following the 2023 release of “もり桜・金箔” and the 2024 release of “もり桜・一輪花” the latest creation, “もり桜・花鳥風月” will be available starting June 10th, 2025.

This collaboration is a fusion of “森カリオペ” unique charm and the refined aesthetic of “花道物語” “MoriZakura もり桜・花鳥風月” is inspired by the concept of “beautiful natural scenery,” capturing the visual and flavor profile of cherry blossoms. It delivers a unique experience characteristic of sakura liqueur.

: For individual purchases, tapestry (one of the four illustration designs) will be shipped randomly.

: Scheduled to start around June 2025

About 重星戰略, We’s Star LTD. Aligned with the strategic rhythm of the global market, We’s Star LTD. gathers experts in prototyping, art, and marketing to create outstanding IP works with high standards. The company invests in the international market, collaborating with world-class IPs, companies, brands, and partners to build global strategies.

We’s Star Official X (Twitter)：

https://x.com/wesstar_corp 重星戰略企劃有限公司 / 重星戦略大阪株式会社
